span.p:
ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Temperature Example:
20Â°C request at 2pm
+ Hot summer day
+ Conference room
+ 30 people expected
â†’ Pre-cool to 18Â°C

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
ğŸ’¡ Lighting Example:
Bright lights request
+ Presentation mode
+ Afternoon sun
+ Energy peak hours
â†’ Adjust blinds first

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
ğŸ”’ Security Example:
After-hours access
+ Known employee
+ Scheduled meeting
+ Weather emergency
â†’ Allow with monitoring
